property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each map task. If this is not specified or is non-positive, it is inferred from mapreduce.map.java.opts and mapreduce.job.heap.memory-mb.ratio. If java-opts are also not specified, we set it to 1024.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each reduce task. If this is not specified or is non-positive, it is inferred from mapreduce.reduce.java.opts and mapreduce.job.heap.memory-mb.ratio. If java-opts are also not specified, we set it to 1024.
